mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (board_idx, replytext, replyer) VALUES (#{board_idx}, #{replytext}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET replytext = #{replytext}, updatedate = now() WHERE idx = #{idx}
